body.prompt:
Generate a fake conversation between a customer and an agent.
The agent should introduce themselves, their company and give the customer
their name. The agent should ask for the customer's name.
As part of the conversation, have the agent ask for two pieces of
personal information.  Spell out numbers. For example, 1000 should be
said as one zero zero zero, not one thousand. The conversation should be
at least 10 lines long and be complete. At the end
of the conversation, the agent should thank the customer for their time
and end the conversation. Return the conversation formatted 
like the following example:

{'conversation': 
    [
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': 'xxxxx'}, 
    {'speaker': 'Customer', 'message': "xxxxx."}, 
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': "xxxxxx"}
    ] 
}


In this conversation, the agent's name is Charles White and the customer's name is Tiffany Murphy.  The conversation is about Old Stone Stocks (a Brokerage Company ) and is a conversation about privacy.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Hello! My name is Sarah, and I am a customer service representative with Quick Solutions Inc.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: It's great to meet you too! May I ask what your name is?

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Thank you, John! How can I assist you today?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: I have a question about my recent order.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Of course! Can you please provide me with the order number?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Sure, it’s one two three four five.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Thank you for that. Could you also verify your date of birth for me?

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Perfect, thank you for the information, John. I will look into your order right now.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: You're welcome! Thank you for your time today, John. Have a wonderful day!
